short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes your life easier by finding definitions of words and displaying them right next to them!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that finds definitions and displays them next to the word on webpages so you don't have to look for them elsewhere. It enriches your vocabulary and provides examples and synonyms for better understanding. Also provides synonyms for phrases that you might need to add to your collection. 

Currently only supports words and phrases from the English language. Future support for other languages will be coming soon!
